subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Trevor Hoffman was charged with his second loss in three appearances Sunday, allowing Chin-Lung Hu’s tie-breaking single in the ninth inning of the San Diego Padres’ 3-2 loss to the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers.
snippet: Trevor Hoffman was charged with his second loss in three appearances Sunday, allowing Chin-Lung Hu’s tie-breaking single in the ninth inning of the San Diego Padres’ 3-2 loss to the visiting Los Angeles Dodgers.
